-------file:    (./fixtures/replace1.txt)
-------options: none
-------name: minus_plus
---- minus_plus[./fixtures/replace1.txt] ++++

-------file:    ("./fixtures/replace3.txt")
-------options: {text?padleft=4&before=\n&after=\n,breakstring?width=90&flags=word}
-------name: minus_plus
----minus_plus["./fixtures/replace3.txt"]{text?padleft=4&before=\n&after=\n,breakstring?width=90&flags=word}++++
